Trigger.Name: 1 Fang and Claw Gain
Trigger.RegularExpression: \[.{14}1A:[A-F0-9]{8}:(?<player>[a-zA-Z-' ]{3,21}) gains the effect of (Sharper Fang And Claw|Fang And Claw)

Trigger.Name: 1 Wheeling Thrust Gain
Trigger.RegularExpression: \[.{14}1A:[A-F0-9]{8}:(?<player>[a-zA-Z-' ]{3,21}) gains the effect of (Enhanced Wheeling Thrust|Wheeling Thrust)

Trigger.Name: 1 Leaden Fist Set (English)
Trigger.RegularExpression: \[.{14}1A:[A-F0-9]{8}:(?<player>[a-zA-Z-' ]{3,21}) gains the effect of Leaden Fist

Trigger.Name: Raptor (English)
Trigger.RegularExpression: \[.{14}1A:[A-F0-9]{8}:(?<player>[a-zA-Z-' ]{3,21}) gains the effect of Raptor Form

Trigger.Name: Raptor Off (English)

Trigger.Name: Coeurl (English)

Trigger.Name: Coeurl Off (English)

Trigger.Name: 0 Job Change
Trigger.RegularExpression: (/hud requires a valid HUD element|The command /hud is unavailable at this time|You change to)
